General.Name: GRITEE Inc
General.Description: GRITEE, Inc. manufactures and sells apparel in Asia. The company also wholesales and licenses apparel brands; and manufactures in-garments. It offers its products under the huit8 Paris, Missing Dorothy, Lefee, Secret Lab, accolade, Pearly Shell, and Dr. Miz brands, as well as through other imported and licensed brands. The company was formerly known as MCorset, Inc. GRITEE, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, Korea.
